definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: Morning, light rain is still painstaking work of his sister.
sentences.chinese: 今早，小雨妹妹還在不辭辛苦的工作。

sentences.english: Some people start running with the hope that the pounds will quickly start melting away as they're pounding the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 有些人們一心想要減輕體重，開始了不辭辛苦的長跑。

sentences.english: He spared no pains to bring up the child.
sentences.chinese: 他不辭辛苦養育那小孩。

sentences.english: I truly hope that you can take the trouble to arrange another interview.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望您能不辭辛苦重新安排一次面試。
